title: Decision Proposition
description: The  Decision Proposition XDM is used to capture the outcome of a decisioning process

xdm:offerActivity.title: Offer Activity
xdm:offerActivity.description: Snapshot of the offer activity for which the proposition was made. The object contains at least the @id property value which is the URI of the offer activity. See schema https://ns.adobe.com/experience/offer-management/offer-activity

xdm:offers.title: Proposed Offers
xdm:offers.description: Snapshots of the personalized offers that were selected for this activity. The objects contain a at least the @id property value which is the URI of a personalized offer. See schema https://ns.adobe.com/experience/offer-management/personalized-offer

xdm:fallbackOffer.title: Fallback Offer
xdm:fallbackOffer.description: Snapshot of the Fallback offer that was selected because no personalized offer satisfied the constaints. The object contains at least the @id property value which is the URI of the fallback offer. See schema https://ns.adobe.com/experience/offer-management/fallback-offer

xdm:placement.title: Placement
xdm:placement.description: Snapshot of the Placement for the fallback or personalized offer. The object contains at least the @id property value which is the URI of the offer placement. See schema https://ns.adobe.com/experience/offer-management/offer-placement

xdm:channel.title: Experience Channel
xdm:channel.description: Snapshot of the experience channel related to this experience event. The value is determined by the placement is recorded in the event as a snapshot.

xdm:environment.title: Environment
xdm:environment.description: Information about the surrounding situation the decision occurred in, specifically detailing transitory information such as the network or software versions.

xdm:productListItems.title: Product List Items
xdm:productListItems.description: A list of items representing a product selected by a customer with specific options and pricing that are context for the decision.

xdm:device.title: Device
xdm:device.description: An identified Device/Application or Device/Browser instance that is trackable across sessions, normally by cookies.

xdm:commerce.title: Commerce
xdm:commerce.description: The commerce specific data related to this decision.

xdm:application.title: Application
xdm:application.description: The application related to the decision. It could be either the application targeted by the event like the send of a push notification or the application originating the event such as a click, or a login.

xdm:directMarketing.title: Direct Marketing
xdm:directMarketing.description: The events and properties related to direct/outbound marketing that provided context to the decision, such as email, direct mail, texts and in-app notifications.

xdm:marketing.title: Marketing
xdm:marketing.description: The information related to marketing activities that provided context to the decision and were active with the touchpoint.

xdm:placeContext.title: Place Context
xdm:placeContext.description: The transient circumstances related to the observation. Examples include locale specific information such as weather, local time, traffic, day of the week, workday vs. holiday, working hours.

xdm:metrics.title: Metrics
xdm:metrics.description: Additional measurements observed while the decision was made and which provided context to the decision process.

items.description: A measurement for a metrics that needs to contain the `xdm:value` and the `@type`. The `@type` references one of the metric definitions derived from `https://ns.adobe.com/xdm/data/metricdefinition`
